title: 关于1.7.10mod端启动失败问题
author: 白狐苏悦
txt_content:
启动器为HMCL
错误日志
[03:04:56] [main/INFO] *** Hello Minecraft! Launcher 2.4.1.5 ***
[03:04:56] [main/INFO] Initialized settings.
[03:05:04] [AWT-EventQueue-0/INFO] Start generating launching command...
[03:05:04] [Game Launcher/INFO] Building process
[03:05:04] [Game Launcher/INFO] Logging in...
[03:05:04] [Game Launcher/INFO] Detecting libraries...
[03:05:04] [Game Launcher/INFO] Unpacking natives...
[03:05:08] [Game Launcher/INFO] *** Make shell command ***
[03:05:08] [Game Launcher/INFO] On making head command.
[03:05:08] [Game Launcher/INFO] Java Version: 1.8.0_91
[03:05:08] [Game Launcher/INFO] Java Platform: 64
[03:05:08] [Game Launcher/INFO] System Platform: 64
[03:05:08] [Game Launcher/INFO] System Physical Memory: 8079
[03:05:08] [Game Launcher/INFO] On making launcher args.
[03:05:08] [Game Launcher/INFO] Starting process
[03:05:08] [Game Launcher/INFO] Have started the process
[03:05:13] [ProcessMonitor/INFO] Process exit code: 1
[03:05:13] [ProcessMonitor/ERROR] The game exited abnormally, exit code: 1

replies.author: mine新时代xs
replies.txt_content: 请不要使用HMCL 2.4.1.5启动游戏，这是老版本的HMCL了，更新你的HMCL以尝试解决这个问题

replies.author: 白狐苏悦
replies.txt_content:
mine新时代xs 发表于 2019-6-2 10:14
请不要使用HMCL 2.4.1.5启动游戏，这是老版本的HMCL了，更新你的HMCL以尝试解决这个问题 ...
这边已经找出原因了 是因为mod乱码
